name: Mellow Woods
description:
Interact with the animals, they’ll help you to find the key that opens the door.

Short game made to demonstrate the possibilities of VR. Let’s say, it’s more a technical demo rather than a complete game. However, it is fully playable. It has a mission, and a final.

This game has been published on Sept. 4th 2018 on Play Store after one week in development.

========================================

TECHNICAL DETAILS
  • Platforms: Android w/ Cardboard
  • Tools And Technologies: Unity
  • Credits:
    Coding:     Tony MtzCharacters: Polydactyl
    World: Free assets courtesy of Kenney
  • Play Now!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GatoMocho.MellowWoods

========================================

PRIVACY POLICY

This game is not recording any kind of information or sending it to any service.
